channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
hmm ok im working on my 474 server and i wanna do something (P.S it's kinda hard because it's diffrent from the 317's.)
i want to know how to add god sword spec... so when i go into attack place there should be a spec if i set one for it ddo you guys know how to do it?
and how do i change the thing when you go into were the attack styles are to say the wepeons name not something else and also ur combat lvl.
How do i make it so when you wearing a skill cape the skill cape icon lights up?and the other are already lit up how do i make it like that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2009, 03:17:44 pm[/size][hr]come on anyone gonna help me out please i think im going to be the first succsecfull one to make a 474 if i finish it -.-
